attributes.additional_details:
He has proven that you can achieve what you set your mind to, he has thought back through his mental health, the media to prove he is the best of the best.

He has been the back bone of loads of mental health charities and more
attributes.background: We believe Tyson Fury should have an OBE for the great work he has done with mental health, his local community and for being the best boxer in his era.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
